document_data.caption: From left to right: a [[geonid (4e)|geonid]], a [[rockfist smasher]], a shardstorm vortex, and a [[windfiend fury]].
document_data.name: Shardstorm Vortex
document_data.subtype4e: [[:Category:Creatures with the air subtype|Air]], [[:Category:Creatures with the earth subtype|Earth]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Shardstorm vortexes''' were a type of [[elemental]] of [[air]] and [[Earth (element)|earth]] that were native to the [[Elemental Chaos]].
document_data.Description: These elementals had swirling bodies of air, like a funnelcloud or whirlwind, with numerous green crystal shards.

Society.Diet: These elementals were scavengers, feeding off the destruction left by more powerful elementals.
Society.Languages: These elementals could only speak the [[Primordial language]].
